creator: Shoyo
descriptionHtml:
The Bukvar application is designed for learning letters, Cyrillic Azbuka, Latin Abeceda and English Alphabet. For each letter of the alphabet there are three illustrations, as well as pronunciation for letters and images. Youngest children can use this program by themselves, because it is intuitive and easy.

Bukvar include two games for learning letters and testing progress.
descriptionShort: Easy learn letters trough simple game and images. Best for kids.
title: 📖 Bukvar 📖 spelling letters
